subject: Re: TAPSCON Clearwater Florida
author: kolrone
full_text:
That doesn't sound too promising. I can use that $35 to almost fill up
my lil toyota gas tank all the way. Lol. I don't really want to wait
in line just to end up being disappointed. Hopefully the webcast will
be up tomorrow and we can watch it. I guess I can just surf around the
forum and see if anyone has a link to recordings of the event or
something.

-Aaron
